name: Overlander
description:
A Moon Buggy game for Amiga & Amiga emulators. I originally released this game in 1994.

Ride your rover over the landscape, jump over craters, and use your front and up firing gun to shoot the obstacles and enemies. Overlander was inspired by the Dragon 32 game, Lunar Rover Patrol. This was my 12th Amiga game. Years later, I remade a version of this game for PC as Martian Rover Patrol (1999).

Supplied in ADF format for use with Amiga emulators, and in RP9 format for use with Cloanto's Amiga Forever and other RetroPlatform emulators.
